content: Upon beginning your journey, you’ll be thrust into the role of the mythical Sun Wukong as he rebels against the Court of Heaven and its Heavenly Kings. Undaunted by their army, Sun Wukong calls them out, prompting the nephew of the Jade Emperor, Erlang Shen, to meet him in combat.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Forest_of_Wolves_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Prologue'.
The content is as follows:
Upon beginning your journey, you’ll be thrust into the role of the mythical Sun Wukong as he rebels against the Court of Heaven and its Heavenly Kings. Undaunted by their army, Sun Wukong calls them out, prompting the nephew of the Jade Emperor, Erlang Shen, to meet him in combat.
